title: True Crime Story: Indefensible
overview: True Crime Story: Indefensible – From a completely unexpected, but dazzlingly effective host – a gonzo and highly personal approach to the genre. With a modern feminist perspective, Jena Friedman is bringing the slightly comedic, deadpan and disarming interview concept popularized by the Daily Show to the True Crime genre; with which she unearths the hidden elements in cases that tell the real story.
